Welsh Brewers Challenge Contest 0 Set Test and Own Choice

Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Mark Hutcherson, Euphonium (BTM) Prizes - 1st £500, 2nd £250, 3rd £150, prize of £100 to band of best individual player. 6 bands competed.
